summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Newton Street, from 23rd Avenue West to Thorndyke Avenue; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 11200 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
